name: Run Thief
description:
Run Thief - In the game you have to play the role of a thief who stole a plan of a plot against the Emperor. Passing traps and various locations in the light of day or at night, moving away from the chase, the player will have an interesting adventure on behalf of a young thief saving his house from the conspirators.
The player needs to go through traps such as stakes, fire rain and much more. To avoid pursuit in various locations such as the Immaculate Towers, the old wall, Coniferous Forest and others.
The pursuit will not stop not during the day, not at night, not even in the bloody sun (the gameplay changes a little:))
The game is very suitable for children over 6 years old, thanks to simple controls and easy traps at the first difficulty levels.
